title: Donald Trump Jr. to visit Romania right before contentious election
summary: Donald Trump Jr. is set to visit Romania – just six days before its rescheduled and highly contentious presidential election – for what is being billed as a “Trump Business Vision 2025” event
description: Donald Trump Jr. is set to visit Romania – just six days before its rescheduled and highly contentious presidential election – for what is being billed as a “Trump Business Vision 2025” event

notes: Event from comprehensive timeline tracking democratic erosion.
